segments.text: Which city are you staying in right now ? And the name of your hotel ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm in Beijing , at the Weston Hotel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have your passport with you ? Or do you by any chance know the number ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't have it to hand , but I know the number . It's 16211469 9 . Can you do anything , like stop the card for example ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me repeat that back to you , 16211469 9 . That's just what I've done , Mr Kowalski , I've stopped your card temporarily .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But , what do I do if I need cash ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can go to any branch of IBA and request the Emergency Assistance Service . Everything will be taken care of , there's no need to worry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you so much . I'll find the nearest branch and come in tomorrow . Thanks again for all of your help .
segments.speaker: S2
